sys_update_version.payload: customc.panel { position: relative; } .panel-heading i { cursor: pointer; position: absolute; padding: 10px; top: 0px; right: 0px; cursor: pointer; } .disabled-filter { color: #A0A0A0; } .list-group-item.ng-enter { transition: all 1s; -webkit-transition: all 1s; background-color: #c0dcfa; } .list-group-item.ng-enter-active { background-color: #fff; } .hide-x-overflow { overflow-x: hidden; } .translated-html > p { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; } IMG { max-width: auto; max-height: auto; } IMG.img-sm { max-height: 40px; max-width: 40px; } .filter-box { margin-top: 10px; } .panel-footer { .number-shown-label { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; font-size: 16px; display: inline-block; } a { color: inherit; } } .panel-title .fa { padding-right: 4px; } .list-group-item > a { display: inline-block; }sp_instancefalsehappy_immo_listfalseHappy Immo Listfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2023-12-14 16:09:03a8cd06e6938f71101c3a3a5efaba10e72Happy Immo List4dbd9096930731101c3a3a5efaba10a44dbd9096930731101c3a3a5efaba10a4sp_widget_a8cd06e6938f71101c3a3a5efaba10e7admin2023-12-14 18:57:38
